wallet.title: [user]'s Wallet
wallet.description: Here you can see user wallet and bank account balance and also her bank `*ipr`.
wallet.footer: *interest per day is bassically percentage of your bank balance that you get every day.

not-enough.title: Not enough money
not-enough.description: You don't have enough money to deposit `[amount]`. You have `[wallet]` in your wallet.

success.title: Deposit successful
success.description: You have successfully deposited `[amount]` to your bank account.

not_engough.title: Not enough money
not_engough.description: You don't have enough money to withdraw `[amount]`. You have `[bank]` in your bank account.

success.title: Withdraw successful
success.description: You have successfully withdrawn `[amount]` from your bank account.
